text: Beer makes you feel the way you ought to feel without beer.
author: Henry Lawson

text: There is no such thing as a bad beer. It's that some taste better than others.
author: Billy Carter

text: You can do anything with beer that you can do with wine. Beer is great for basting or marinating meat and fish.
author: Grant Wood

text: I'm an old-fashioned guy... I want to be an old man with a beer belly sitting on a porch, looking at a lake or something.
author: Johnny Depp

text: Dinosaurs had not beer. How did that work out?
author: Unknown Author
